name: Elementico
description:
Elementico is a small 2D platformer with simple puzzle elements. The character is a lizard who has to change his element to progress in the world. There're 3 different elements: fire, ice and air, each with his own characteristics.

There are 3 different level and an additional boss level.

This game was the result from a student project and developed over 2 semster long in SFML in C#. Additionally we used TGUI, Box2D and Tiled.

Have fun.
